author: bip
msg: Initial revision, broken out from FileStore.

author: horwat
msg: Use QName instead of the LocalName to match element value.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the implementation of ServletRequest.getCharacterEncoding() to return
null if the request does not include a character encoding, as specified in the
Javadocs.  If you call request.getReader() on a request with no character
encoding, the server will still use ISO-8859-1 as required by the spec.
